snippet: Stocks surged on Friday, with the Dow Jones industrial average gaining more than 200 points, after the Labor Department reported an increase in hiring.
abstract: Stocks surge, with the Dow Jones industrial average gaining more than 200 points to end a four-day losing streak; uptick follows a Labor Department report indicating an increase in hiring in July.
lead_paragraph: Stocks surged on Friday, with the Dow Jones industrial average gaining more than 200 points, after the Labor Department reported an increase in hiring.

headline.seo: Two-Sided Jobs Report Lets Stocks Rebound
headline.main: Two-Sided Jobs Report Lets Stocks Erase a Bad Week
headline.print_headline: Two-Sided Jobs Report Lets Stocks Erase a Bad Week
